lead_paragraph: Andre Iguodala and Harrison Barnes bombed in 3-pointers on consecutive possessions during an eight-point flurry that opened a 12-point lead early in the fourth quarter, and the Golden State Warriors held on from there to stay alive in the Western Conference finals with a 120-111 victory over the Oklahoma Thunder on Thursday night.

headline.print_headline: Warriors Shoot Past Thunder, Extend West Finals
headline.main: Warriors Shoot Past Thunder, Extend West Finals
